description: Try our easy to follow Barbecued Salmon with Asian Slaw recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ fish,BBQ,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Low salt,Quick & easy lunch,Summer,Salmon
name: Barbecued Salmon with Asian Slaw Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat BBQ on high. Combine coriander, garlic and ginger in a bowl. Cut a pocket into sides of salmon fillets.
Spoon herb mixture into each pocket and place onto a tray. Season. BBQ, skin-side down, for 4 minutes. Turn and cook second side for about 2 minutes or until cooked to your liking.
In a bowl, whisk vinegar, oil, honey and soy together. In a seperate bowl, combine cabbage, carrot and spring onion.
Pour dressing over and toss well to combine. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Divide salad between serving plates. Top with salmon. Serve.
